trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data members from the current component's selected data source.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器可以從目前的元件選取的資料來源擷取資料成員的清單。

trans-unit.source: DataMemberConverter provides methods that can retrieve a list of data members from the current data source of a design-time component.
trans-unit.target: DataMemberConverter 提供方法，可以擷取從目前的資料來源的設計階段元件的資料成員的清單。

trans-unit.source: This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data members in the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 此型別轉換子正由[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供出現在清單中的資料成員屬性 視窗中的值。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 您應該永遠不會直接存取型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 請改為使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>呼叫適當的轉換程式

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>中的範例

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別和[How to︰ 實作類型轉換器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the converter can convert an object of the specified source type to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出轉換器是否可以轉換指定的來源類型的物件的原生類型轉換器。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>可用來取得額外的內容資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>代表您想要轉換的類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果轉換子可以執行轉換，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換為轉換器的原生類型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>可用來取得額外的內容資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that can be used to support localization features.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，可用來支援當地語系化的功能。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>轉換。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the specified object after conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>轉換後的指定的物件所表示。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行轉換。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data members present within the selected data source, if information about them is available.
trans-unit.target: 有提供其相關資訊，請在選取的資料來源中，取得存在的資料成員。

trans-unit.source: The converter uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider> implementation of the associated component's designer to retrieve the current data source selection.
trans-unit.target: 使用轉換器<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider>實作來擷取目前的資料來源選取範圍關聯的元件設計工具。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object indicating the component or control to get values for.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>物件，表示元件或控制項，若要取得的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> listing the data members of the data source selected for the component.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>列出選取之元件的資料來源的資料成員。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is a list of all possible values.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否從傳回的標準值集合<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>是一份所有可能的值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果是獨占清單，例如在列舉資料型別，則沒有其他有效值。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單不是獨占，則沒有其他有效值除了標準的清單值<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>提供。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>提供格式內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of all possible values that are valid; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>從<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>有效; 所有可能的值的獨占清單<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果其他的值為可能。 </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection></xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在這個類別中實作時，這個方法一律會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the converter supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個轉換子是否支援一組標準可從清單中挑選的值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>可用來取得額外的內容資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>呼叫尋找一組常用的物件支援的值; 否則應該是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個實作一律會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
